refnamediv.refpurpose: Make a string's first character uppercase

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns a string with the first character of str capitalized, if that character is alphabetic.

Note that 'alphabetic' is determined by the current locale. For instance, in the default "C" locale characters such as umlaut-a (ä) will not be converted.
ucfirst example
<?php $foo = 'hello world!'; $foo = ucfirst($foo); // Hello world!
$bar = 'HELLO WORLD!'; $bar = ucfirst($bar); // HELLO WORLD! $bar = ucfirst(strtolower($bar)); // Hello world! ?>
See also strtolower, strtoupper, and ucwords.
